text: haey a l laoh ban leukayk uteahar krong muoy ( mea kkah) del mean sokh sa ndi pheap del leaphosakkar robsa vea mean krobbebyeang mk pi krobtisati . kraoyomk vea( anak krong mea kkah) ban bdeseth nung nie k meat teanglay robsa a l laoh . haey a l laoh banaoy vea phloksa nouv pheap atkhlean ning pheap phyokhlach daoy sar te avei del puokke thleab ban br pru td
